EmailTemplate.name: New Partner Marketing Agreement - TJ
EmailTemplate.subject: RapidAdvance Agreement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
It was a pleasure to speak with you today. As discussed I have attached the marketing agreement and W9 form. Please review the marketing agreement, initial, sign, and send it back to me. I will also need you to fill out the W9 form and send it back to me with a voided business check. Once I receive the signed agreement I will contact you for the webinar. Let me know if you have any questions.
Regards,
Timothy Sitzler Business Development Associate RapidAdvanceÂ® Direct: 240-380-1656 Fax: 240-283-1634
www.RapidAdvance.com Click Here or Icons Below Connect With Us Today!
